LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_Distend.label: distendable jaw
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_Distend.description: By allowing the jaw to detaach from the skull while still delivering a powerful bite, this jaw allows the host to consume food at a rapid rate.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_Venom.label: venomous fangs
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_Venom.description: By producing a deadly venom and injecting into the enemy, our colonists can have a hidden weapon for any situation.
